isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - ADJUSTMENTS - CAB DOOR STRIKER PIN AT LOCK PILLAR

svcproc.title: CAB DOOR STRIKER PIN AT LOCK PILLAR
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 77 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Use a torx head tool (Item 3) and loosen cab door striker pin (Item 1) to move striker pin up or down and forward or back as required.

In and out adjustment of cab door striker pin (Item 1) is done with spacer shims (Item 4) between cab door striker pin and cab lock pillar (Item 2). Use a torx head tool (Item 3) and remove cab door striker pin and add or remove spacer shims as required and reinstall.
Make final adjustment of cab door striker pin (Item 1) and using a torx head tool (Item 3) tighten to 34 to 50 Lbf-ft (46 to 68 N•m).
